quests.title: A Stranger Arrives
quests.description: You've arrived at Frontier's Edge, a small frontier town at the edge of civilization. The Sheriff might have work for someone with your skills.

stages.title: Get Your Bearings
stages.description: Explore Frontier's Edge and familiarize yourself with the town.
stages.onStartText: The stagecoach has dropped you at the edge of town. Dust settles around your boots. This is Frontier's Edge - not much to look at, but it's a start.
stages.onCompleteText: You've gotten the lay of the land. The Sheriff's office is across the street - might be worth paying a visit.

objectives.description: Visit the saloon to hear local gossip
objectives.hint: The saloon is the heart of any frontier town.

stages.title: Meet the Sheriff
stages.description: Talk to Sheriff Hank about potential work.
stages.onStartText: The Sheriff's office is a solid wooden building with iron bars on the windows.
stages.onCompleteText: Sheriff Hank looks you over with a weathered eye. 'We could use another gun around here. Pick up some supplies from Martha's store, on me. Then prove you can handle yourself.'

stages.title: Gather Supplies
stages.description: Collect supplies from the general store.
stages.onStartText: Martha's General Store has everything a traveler needs.
stages.onCompleteText: You're stocked up and ready. Now to show the Sheriff what you're made of.

stages.title: Prove Yourself
stages.description: Deal with the coyotes harassing travelers on the edge of town.
stages.onStartText: Coyotes have been getting bold lately, attacking travelers near town. Time to thin the pack.
stages.onCompleteText: The coyotes scatter. You've proven you can handle yourself in a fight. The Sheriff will be pleased.

objectives.hint: Check the outskirts of town near the trail.

stages.title: Report to the Sheriff
stages.description: Return to Sheriff Hank and collect your reward.
stages.onStartText: Time to report back to the Sheriff.
stages.onCompleteText: The Sheriff nods approvingly and hands you some coin. 'Not bad. Got a real job for you now, if you're interested. A prospector went missing out on Dusty Trail. Find out what happened to him.'

quests.title: The Missing Prospector
quests.description: A prospector named Jed hasn't been seen in weeks. Sheriff Hank wants you to find out what happened to him.

stages.title: Search Dusty Trail
stages.description: Head out on Dusty Trail where Jed was last seen.
stages.onStartText: Dusty Trail connects Frontier's Edge to Iron Gulch. Jed's claim was somewhere along the way.
stages.onCompleteText: You spot something off the trail - an abandoned wagon, half-hidden in the scrub.

objectives.description: Find the abandoned wagon on Dusty Trail

stages.title: Investigate the Wagon
stages.description: Search the abandoned wagon for clues about the prospector.
stages.onStartText: The wagon is damaged, its contents scattered. There are signs of a struggle.
stages.onCompleteText: You find Jed's journal hidden beneath a loose board. The last entry mentions strange men from Iron Gulch asking about his claim - and something about sabotage at the mine.

stages.title: Deal with Trouble
stages.description: Someone wants to stop you from investigating.
stages.onStartText: You hear footsteps behind you. You're not alone out here.
stages.onCompleteText: The thugs are dealt with. They weren't common bandits - they had mining tools. Something bigger is going on in Iron Gulch.

quests.title: Deep Trouble
quests.description: Jed's journal mentioned sabotage at Iron Gulch. Time to find out what's really going on at the mine.

stages.title: Arrive at Iron Gulch
stages.description: Make your way to the mining town of Iron Gulch.
stages.onStartText: Iron Gulch sits in a narrow canyon, the mine entrance dominating the landscape. Smoke rises from the smelters day and night.
stages.onCompleteText: You've arrived at Iron Gulch. The tension in the air is palpable - miners whisper and look over their shoulders.

stages.title: Meet Foreman Burke
stages.description: The mine foreman might know about the sabotage.
stages.onStartText: Foreman Burke runs the day-to-day operations. He's a hard man, but fair by all accounts.
stages.onCompleteText: Burke confirms the sabotage - three collapses in the past month, all in the same section. He suspects someone on the inside, but can't prove anything. He grants you access to investigate.

objectives.description: Find Foreman Burke at the mine office
Speak with Foreman Burke about the sabotage

stages.title: Investigate the Mine
stages.description: Search for evidence of sabotage inside the mine.
stages.onStartText: The mine is a labyrinth of tunnels and shafts. The sabotaged section has been sealed, but you might find clues elsewhere.
stages.onCompleteText: You find signs of deliberate weakening - support beams cut, not rotted. Someone wanted those tunnels to collapse. A piece of torn cloth caught on a nail might lead to the saboteur.

stages.title: Question the Suspects
stages.description: Two miners have been acting suspicious - Silas and a newcomer named Vance.
stages.onStartText: Burke mentioned two miners who have been acting strange lately. Time to have a chat.
stages.onCompleteText: Silas seems nervous but genuine - he's been skimming supplies to feed his family, not sabotaging the mine. Vance, however, was nowhere to be found. Suspicious.

objectives.hint: Check the saloon - miners drink there after shifts.

quests.title: The Engineer's Secret
quests.description: The mine's engineer, Clara, might know more than she's letting on. Gain her trust to learn the truth.

stages.title: Find Engineer Clara
stages.description: Locate Clara in her workshop.
stages.onStartText: Clara runs the mine's machinery - steam engines, lifts, ventilation. If anyone knows the technical details of the sabotage, it's her.
stages.onCompleteText: Clara is hesitant at first, but when you show her the evidence, her expression changes. 'We need to talk. Somewhere private.'

stages.title: Help Clara's Investigation
stages.description: Clara needs help accessing sealed records.
stages.onStartText: Clara suspects the sabotage is connected to something bigger - maybe someone outside Iron Gulch. She needs access to the company records, but they're locked away.
stages.onCompleteText: The records reveal payments from an unknown source to someone in Iron Gulch. Clara's face pales. 'This goes higher than I thought.'

objectives.hint: The bartender might help you get the guard away from his post.

objectives.description: Help Clara access the company records

stages.title: Clara's Revelation
stages.description: Clara reveals what she knows. You must decide how much to trust her.
stages.onStartText: Clara has been investigating on her own for months. She's closer to the truth than anyone.
stages.onCompleteText: Clara hands you a small mechanical device. 'Take this. It might help you in the mine. The saboteur will try again soon - probably in the deep section. We need to catch them in the act.'

objectives.description: Trust Clara completely and share all your evidence
objectives.hint: Sharing everything might strengthen your alliance.

objectives.description: Remain cautious - share only partial information
objectives.hint: You barely know her - caution might be wise.

quests.title: Confrontation
quests.description: The saboteur will strike again tonight. It's time to catch them in the act and end this.

stages.title: Prepare for the Trap
stages.description: Get ready for the confrontation.
stages.onStartText: Tonight is the night. You and Clara have a plan - catch the saboteur in the deep section of the mine.
stages.onCompleteText: You're as ready as you'll ever be. Time to head into the mine.

objectives.description: Stock up on supplies for the confrontation
Meet Clara at the mine entrance after dark

stages.title: Spring the Trap
stages.description: Catch the saboteur in the deep section of the mine.
stages.onStartText: The mine is eerie at night - only the distant drip of water and creak of timber. You wait in the darkness.
stages.onCompleteText: Movement in the shadows. It's Vance - and he's not alone. They're planting more explosives!

objectives.description: Enter the deep section of the mine
Wait for the saboteur to appear

stages.title: Defeat the Saboteur
stages.description: Confront Vance and his accomplices. This won't be easy.
stages.onStartText: Vance draws his weapon. 'You should have minded your own business, stranger. Now you'll be buried with the rest.'
stages.onCompleteText: Vance falls, clutching a letter in his hand. As he dies, he laughs. 'You think this ends here? This is bigger than Iron Gulch. Check Mesa Point... or Coldwater. Salvation awaits us all.'

stages.title: The Revelation
stages.description: Search Vance for clues about the conspiracy.
stages.onStartText: The letter in Vance's hand might hold answers.
stages.onCompleteText: The letter reveals a larger conspiracy - payments from someone called 'The Shepherd' and references to both Mesa Point and Coldwater. Whatever this is, Iron Gulch was just the beginning. The trail leads to either the outlaw town of Mesa Point or the ranching community of Coldwater.

quests.title: Honor Among Thieves
quests.description: The letter mentioned Mesa Point. The outlaws there might know something about this conspiracy.

stages.title: Enter Mesa Point
stages.description: Make your way to the outlaw town of Mesa Point.
stages.onStartText: Mesa Point sits in a box canyon - one way in, one way out. Perfect for outlaws who want to see trouble coming.
stages.onCompleteText: The outlaws eye you warily. You'll need to earn their trust - or find another way to get information.

objectives.description: Travel to Mesa Point via Desert Pass

stages.title: Gain Reyna's Trust
stages.description: Red Eye Reyna runs Mesa Point. You'll need to prove yourself to her.
stages.onStartText: Reyna is a legend among outlaws - ruthless but fair. She might help if you have something to offer.
stages.onCompleteText: Reyna considers you. 'You've got guts, I'll give you that. But trust is earned around here. Do a job for me, and we'll talk.'

objectives.description: Find Reyna at the outlaws' hideout

stages.title: Do Reyna's Job
stages.description: Reyna wants you to intercept a supply shipment. It's a test.
stages.onStartText: Reyna's test: hit a supply wagon heading through the pass. Non-lethal if possible - she's not cruel, just pragmatic.
stages.onCompleteText: The job is done. Reyna is impressed. 'You've got skills. Now, about that information you wanted...'

objectives.description: Intercept the supply wagon on Desert Pass
Deal with the guards (lethal or non-lethal)

stages.title: The Choice
stages.description: Reyna has information. But there's a price: betray the outlaws to the law, or work with them against the conspiracy.
stages.onStartText: Reyna knows about 'The Shepherd' and the conspiracy. She'll share everything - if you help her strike back against whoever is behind this. Or you could report everything to the law...
stages.onCompleteText: Your choice is made. Either way, you now have documents proving a connection between the conspiracy and Salvation - a town controlled by a preacher named Solomon.

objectives.description: Betray the outlaws to gain evidence (lose outlaw trust)
Work with the outlaws temporarily (gain outlaw trust)

quests.title: The Rancher's Plight
quests.description: The letter also mentioned Coldwater. The ranchers there are having trouble - trouble that might be connected to the conspiracy.

stages.title: Arrive at Coldwater
stages.description: Travel to the ranching community of Coldwater.
stages.onStartText: Coldwater is pastoral and peaceful - or it was. The ranchers have been losing cattle and tempers are running high.
stages.onCompleteText: The ranchers are on edge. Rancher McGraw, the community leader, might know what's going on.

objectives.description: Travel to Coldwater via Mountain Road

stages.title: Meet Rancher McGraw
stages.description: Find out what troubles the ranchers.
stages.onStartText: McGraw is a weathered man who has worked this land his whole life. He looks tired.
stages.onCompleteText: McGraw tells you about the rustlers - they're organized, professional, and always one step ahead. He suspects someone is feeding them information.

objectives.description: Find Rancher McGraw at the ranch house

stages.title: Track the Rustlers
stages.description: Follow the trail and find where the rustlers are taking the cattle.
stages.onStartText: Fresh tracks lead into the badlands. The rustlers have a camp somewhere out there.
stages.onCompleteText: You've found the rustler camp - and they're connected to the same conspiracy. They have documents with that same symbol.

stages.title: The Wanderer Knows
stages.description: There's a mysterious traveler camped outside town who might know more.
stages.onStartText: The Wanderer has been watching the frontier for years. They see things others miss.
stages.onCompleteText: The Wanderer reveals more than expected - they've been tracking the conspiracy for years. 'It all leads to Salvation,' they say. 'To a man who calls himself The Shepherd. Preacher Solomon.'

quests.title: Pieces of the Puzzle
quests.description: The evidence points to Salvation and Preacher Solomon. Time to put the pieces together.

stages.title: Review the Evidence
stages.description: Go through everything you have learned.
stages.onStartText: You have documents, testimony, and connections. Time to see the full picture.
stages.onCompleteText: The pattern is clear: Preacher Solomon has been destabilizing the frontier - sabotage, rustling, crime - all to weaken the communities. But why? The answer lies in Salvation.

stages.title: Consult Your Allies
stages.description: Talk to those who have helped you along the way.
stages.onStartText: You've made friends and contacts across the frontier. Their insights might be valuable.
stages.onCompleteText: Clara, The Wanderer, even Reyna - they all agree: Solomon is dangerous, and whatever he's planning is about to happen. The final trail to Salvation awaits.

stages.title: Prepare for Salvation
stages.description: Stock up and ready yourself for the final journey.
stages.onStartText: The road to Salvation is long and dangerous. Make sure you are prepared.
stages.onCompleteText: You're as ready as you'll ever be. The final trail awaits. There's no turning back once you start.

quests.title: The Final Trail
quests.description: The road to Salvation is treacherous. Survive the journey and reach the source of the conspiracy.

stages.title: Point of No Return
stages.description: WARNING: Once you proceed, there is no turning back.
stages.onStartText: This is it. Once you enter Salvation, you won't be able to leave until the matter is settled. Are you ready?
stages.onCompleteText: You steel yourself and press forward. Whatever awaits in Salvation, you will face it.

objectives.description: Confirm you are ready to proceed (Point of No Return)
objectives.hint: Make sure you have prepared before confirming.

stages.title: Survive the Trail
stages.description: The final trail is the most dangerous path on the frontier.
stages.onStartText: The badlands stretch before you, harsh and unforgiving. Enemies lurk behind every rock.
stages.onCompleteText: After countless miles and battles, you see it - Salvation rises from the desert like a mirage. A church steeple dominates the skyline.

stages.title: Allies Gather
stages.description: Your allies from across the frontier arrive to help in the final confrontation.
stages.onStartText: You're not alone. Those you helped along the way have come to stand with you.
stages.onCompleteText: With your allies at your side, you feel ready to face whatever Preacher Solomon has planned.

objectives.description: Meet with any allies who have come to help

quests.title: Salvation's Secret
quests.description: Investigate the town of Salvation and uncover the truth about Preacher Solomon.

stages.title: Explore Salvation
stages.description: The town seems peaceful, but something is wrong.
stages.onStartText: Salvation is eerily quiet. The townsfolk move with purpose but speak in hushed tones. The church looms over everything.
stages.onCompleteText: The people here are devoted to Solomon - fanatically so. Whatever he is preaching, they believe completely.

stages.title: Investigate the Church
stages.description: The church holds the answers. Find a way inside.
stages.onStartText: The church is heavily guarded. You'll need to find another way in, or confront the guards directly.
stages.onCompleteText: Inside the church, you find evidence of Solomon's true plan - a vault beneath the altar containing something ancient and dangerous.

objectives.description: Find a way into the church

stages.title: The Truth
stages.description: Confront what you have learned about Solomon.
stages.onStartText: The evidence tells a story - but is Solomon the mastermind, or is he being used by something greater?
stages.onCompleteText: The truth depends on what you've discovered: If you gathered full evidence, Solomon is clearly being manipulated by a darker force. If not, he appears to be the villain himself. Either way, the final confrontation awaits.

objectives.description: Analyze the evidence in the vault

quests.title: Reckoning
quests.description: The final confrontation. The fate of the frontier hangs in the balance.

stages.title: Descend into Darkness
stages.description: Enter the underground complex beneath the church.
stages.onStartText: The key unlocks a passage beneath the altar. Stone steps lead down into darkness. Your allies ready themselves.
stages.onCompleteText: The underground complex is ancient - far older than Salvation. Steampunk machinery hums alongside stone carvings.

stages.title: The Final Battle
stages.description: Face the true enemy and determine the fate of the frontier.
stages.onStartText: At the heart of the complex, you find the source of it all. This ends now.
stages.onCompleteText: The battle is fierce, but you prevail. The conspiracy is shattered, and the frontier can begin to heal.

stages.title: The Reckoning
stages.description: Your choices determine the ending.
stages.onStartText: With the threat ended, the future of the frontier unfolds based on your actions.
stages.onCompleteText: The story of Iron Frontier concludes. But the frontier stretches on forever, and there are always new trails to blaze.

objectives.description: Witness the outcome of your journey
